title: Episode 201 - Lethal Weapon Star Clayne Crawford
itunes:author: Tetherball Academy Media
itunes:subtitle: Ross Patterson sits down with Clayne Crawford who plays "Riggs" on the smash hit tv show Lethal Weapon on Fox for a 1 on 1 interview. If you have ever dreamed of becoming an actor, this is the most raw and brutally honest show about what it takes to achi...
itunes:summary:
Ross Patterson sits down with Clayne Crawford who plays "Riggs" on the smash hit tv show Lethal Weapon on Fox for a 1 on 1 interview. If you have ever dreamed of becoming an actor, this is the most raw and brutally honest show about what it takes to achieve stardom. You'll never hear an actor open up like this. Incredible show.

description:
Ross Patterson sits down with Clayne Crawford who plays "Riggs" on the smash hit tv show Lethal Weapon on Fox for a 1 on 1 interview. If you have ever dreamed of becoming an actor, this is the most raw and brutally honest show about what it takes to achieve stardom. You'll never hear an actor open up like this. Incredible show.

content:encoded:
Ross Patterson sits down with Clayne Crawford who plays "Riggs" on the smash hit tv show Lethal Weapon on Fox for a 1 on 1 interview. If you have ever dreamed of becoming an actor, this is the most raw and brutally honest show about what it takes to achieve stardom. You'll never hear an actor open up like this. Incredible show.
